Hello, my name is Alessio and I work as Business Analyst. I am a lot into Python and a bit into R (statistics). I have experience with international pricing and I think that pricing is still too basic in ecommerce. I am here because I'd like to meet ruby and rails developers (which I'm trying to learn by the way), but also to discuss some ideas.
Would love to meet designers, no need to be in Sillicon Valley or LA :). If you rock or know someone that rocks, let's connect.

Hi! I'm a programmer working with Servers, Android and iOS, mostly multiplayer related things. My current primary programming languages include Python, Java, C++ and Bash. I'm currently working on a relaunch of androidsnippets.com and could use some design help!

My programming knowledge is very basic (VB, PHP, Java, Ruby). I left the programming scene awhile back to focus on other parts of my life (football, baseball, fitness) and the technology scene sort of just left me behind. I've done free-lance web development in the best (from crude CMSes to very unrefined e-commerce stores). 

I currently work in sales for a technology company and do well there, so my goal is to get prototypes developed and get a business off the ground and follow-through by finding intelligent engineers and 'hackers' (in the good sense) and putting together a dream team.
